data.title: About: Leszek, Duke of Masovia
data.meta_description: Leszek of Masovia (Polish: Leszek, also Lestek) (b. ca. 1162 - d. 1186) was a Polish prince from the Piast dynasty, the Duke of Masovia from 1173 until his death. He was the only son of Bolesław IV the Curly, Duke of Masovia and High Prince of Poland, to survive his father. After his father's death he inherited Masovia. At the beginning, Leszek ruled under the guardianship of his uncle Casimir II the Just. He was a man of poor health. For a short time he supported his other uncle, Mieszko III the Old, but later decided to reconcile with Casimir II, who after Leszek's death inherited his duchy.
data.text:
dbo:abstract

Lešek Mazovský (1162? – 1186) byl mazovský kníže v letech 1173 až 1186. Byl jediným synem Boleslava Kadeřavého a Vjačeslavy Novgorodské. (cs)

Ο Λέσεκ, πολων. Leszek (π. 1162 - 1186) από τον Οίκο των Πιαστ ήταν δούκας της Μαζοβίας (1173-86). (el)

Leszek of Masovia (Polish: Leszek, also Lestek) (b. ca. 1162 - d. 1186) was a Polish prince from the Piast dynasty, the Duke of Masovia from 1173 until his death. He was the only son of Bolesław IV the Curly, Duke of Masovia and High Prince of Poland, to survive his father. After his father's death he inherited Masovia. At the beginning, Leszek ruled under the guardianship of his uncle Casimir II the Just. He was a man of poor health. For a short time he supported his other uncle, Mieszko III the Old, but later decided to reconcile with Casimir II, who after Leszek's death inherited his duchy. (en)

Leszek dari Masovia (bahasa Polski: Leszek juga Lestek) († 1186) merupakan seorang pangeran Polandia yang berasal dari Wangsa Piast, ia menjadi Adipati Masovia dari tahun 1173 sampai kematiannya. Dia adalah satu-satunya putra Bolesław IV Kędzierzawy, Adipati Masovia dan Pangeran Tinggi Polan, yang hidup lebih lama dari ayahanda. Setelah kematian ayahandanya ia mewarisi Masovia. Pada awalnya, Leszek memerintah di bawah perwalian pamandanya Kazimierz II Sprawiedliwy. Dia adalah orang yang kesehatannya buruk. Untuk beberapa saat dia mendukung pamandanya yang lain, Mieszko III Tua, namun kemudian memutuskan untuk berdamai dengan Kazimierz II, yang setelah kematian Leszek mewarisi kadipatennya. (in)

Lech de Mazovie (en polonais Leszek Mazowiecki), de la dynastie des Piasts, est né vers 1162 et décédé en 1186. Duc de Mazovie et de Cujavie de 1173 à 1186, il est le fils de Boleslas IV le Frisé et de sa première épouse Viacheslava de Novgorod. (fr)

Leszek di Masovia (c. 1162 – 1186) è stato un nobile polacco della dinastia Piast, duca di Masovia dal 1173 fino alla sua morte. Fu l'unico figlio di Boleslao IV il Riccio (Boleslao IV di Polonia), duca di Masovia e granduca di Polonia, a sopravvivere a suo padre. Dopo la morte del padre ereditò la Masovia. All'inizio, Leszek governò sotto la tutela di suo zio Casimiro II il Giusto. Era un uomo di salute cagionevole. Per un breve periodo sostenne l'altro zio, Mieszko III il Vecchio (Miecislao III di Polonia), ma in seguito decise di riconciliarsi con Casimiro II, che dopo la morte di Leszek ereditò il suo ducato. (it)

Leszek van Mazovië (circa 1162 - 1186) was van 1173 tot aan zijn dood hertog van Mazovië en . (nl)

Leszek Bolesławowic (ur. ok. 1160, zm. 1186) – książę mazowiecki w latach 1173–1186. (pl)

Лешек Болеславович (польск. Leszek Bolesławowic; 1162 — 5 января 1186) — представитель династии Пястов. Князь Мазовии и Куявии. Единственный сын польского князя Болеслава IV Кудрявого и русской княгини Верхуславы, дочери новгородского князя Всеволода Мстиславовича. (ru)

馬佐夫舍的萊謝克（波蘭語：Leszek Bolesławowic，約1162年—1186年），，波列斯瓦夫四世之子，1173年至1186年在位。 萊謝克在父親波列斯瓦夫四世去世後得到馬佐夫舍作為領地。1186年萊謝克去世，馬佐夫舍被叔父卡齊米日二世佔領。 (zh)

Ле́шек Болесла́вович (пол. Leszek Bolesławowic; бл. 1162—1186) — князь мазовецький і куявський (1173—1186). Представник дому . Єдиний син великого князя польського Болеслава IV і руської князівсни В'ячеслави, доньки вишгородського князя Всеволода Мстиславича. (uk)

He was the only son of Bolesław IV the Curly, Duke of Masovia and High Prince of Poland, to survive his father. After his father's death he inherited Masovia. At the beginning, Leszek ruled under the guardianship of his uncle Casimir II the Just. He was a man of poor health. For a short time he supported his other uncle, Mieszko III the Old, but later decided to reconcile with Casimir II, who after Leszek's death inherited his duchy. (en)

Лешек Болеславович (польск. Leszek Bolesławowic; 1162 — 5 января 1186) — представитель династии Пястов. Князь Мазовии и Куявии. Единственный сын польского князя Болеслава IV Кудрявого и русской княгини Верхуславы, дочери новгородского князя Всеволода Мстиславовича. (ru)

Ле́шек Болесла́вович (пол. Leszek Bolesławowic; бл. 1162—1186) — князь мазовецький і куявський (1173—1186). Представник дому . Єдиний син великого князя польського Болеслава IV і руської князівсни В'ячеслави, доньки вишгородського князя Всеволода Мстиславича. (uk)
